variable.name: SkinSettingsDescriptionVar
variable.value: Display plot outlines in a small size to discourage scrolling.
Enable to make the submenu permanently visible. Default is hidden until pressing down.
This setting moves the Global Search icon on the home screen to the home menu list.
Display Server, User Login and Security Status on home menu.
Choose the icon style for movie widgets. Choices include Posters, Clear Cases, Glass Cases and DVD/Bluray Cases.
Choose the icon style for TV widgets. Choices include Posters and Glass Cases.
Choose the icon style for Music widgets. Choices include Posters and Glass Cases.
Choose the icon shape for Photo widgets. Choices include Square and Landscape.
Enable a Collage of DVD/Bluray cases as the Home menu background.
Set a single image as the background for the Home menu.
Set a slideshow as the background for the Home menu.
Choose the folder for the Home menu slideshow.
Allow a specific section's Home menu backgrounds to be overridden by a user selected slideshow.
Enter the exact name of the section whose backgrounds are to be overridden.
Select the folder containing the backgrounds for the custom slideshow.
